aka: 地平线系列：该不该吃肉？如何喂饱全球人口

cast.name: 迈克尔·莫斯利 Michael Mosley

director.name: 迈克尔·拉赫曼 Michael Lachmann

this_title: Horizon: Should I Eat Meat? How to Feed the Planet
trans_title: 地平线系列：该不该吃肉？如何喂饱全球人口
introduction: Dr Michael Mosley seeks to establish the truth about meat. Every year, humans raise and eat 65 billion animals - nine animals for every person on the globe. In this eye-opening documentary, Michael examines the impact that this is having on the planet and finds out what meat eco-friendly carnivores should be buying. Is it better to buy free-range organic or factory-farmed meat? The answers are far from obvious.
foreign_title: Horizon: Should I Eat Meat? How to Feed the Planet
